name: Potato Soup with Hash Browns
author: nsupanda
summary: Baked potato soup made with hash browns, great for cold weather! I serve it in a bread bowl if I have the frozen bread dough handy and raised. Bread bowl made from Rhodes® frozen bread dough.
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) package frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
⅓ cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
2 tablespoons bacon bits, or to taste
2 tablespoons sliced green onions, or to taste
directions: Put hash browns, chicken broth, soup, potato, onion, and pepper in a slow cooker
Cover and cook on Low until diced potatoes are tender and soup is hot, 3 to 5 hours
Drop in softened cream cheese; use a whisk to get it all melted and mixed in
Garnish with Cheddar cheese, bacon bits, and green onions
